metadata.title: CVE-2022-42252 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: If Apache Tomcat 8.5.0 to 8.5.82, 9.0.0-M1 to 9.0.67, 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.26or 10.1.0-M1 to 10.1.0 was configured to ignore invalid HTTP headers viasetting rejectIllegalHeader to false (the default for 8.5.x only), Tomcatdid not reject a request containing an invalid Content-Length header makinga request smuggling attack possible if Tomcat was located behind a reverseproxy that also failed to reject the request with the invalid header.

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
